scripts.cleanRun: rm -rf test-results allure-results allure-results.zip playwright-report.zip playwright-report artifacts
scripts.docker-clean: docker image prune -f && docker volume prune -f
scripts.debug-mode: npm run cleanRun && DEBUG=pw:browser* playwright test --config=configs/playwright.config.ts
scripts.docker: docker-compose up --force-recreate --build -d && npm run docker-clean && docker compose up
scripts.mobile: npm run cleanRun && npm run adb && playwright test --config=configs/playwright.config.ts
